title: Lost all friends after sion skin patch.
body: just logged in after the patch for the new sion skin was added and all my friends have been removed from my list help!!!!! i tried to re add some via the Facebook friend thing but my other friends who i only know from league are gone too any help would be apreciated im freaking out im literally by myself on league now :(

replies.body:
**Mindstar **has posted an announcement here in case your issue is still ongoing:
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/B41QTqBZ-1542016-friends-list-chat-issues

> **_UPDATE 22:30_
> We've made some fixes to our servers that should hopefully resolve the issue. Let us know if it is fixed!**
> 
> Original Post
> 
> Hi folks,
> 
> We're aware of some issues with the chat system which are causing player's friends lists to not display correctly or at all.
> 
> We're working on it now so stay tuned for updates.
> 
> Cheers
> Mindstar
Ok, good to see it's just not me or my PC. Hope for a fix soon
